snippet: He appeared to contradict reports that the Romney campaign, when considering Chris Christie for the vice presidency, was concerned about his health.
abstract: Mitt Romney says New Jersey Gov Chris Christie could be Republican nominee for president in 2016 and could 'save our party,' comments that appear to contradict reports that Romney's presidential campaign had been concerned about Christie's weight and health.
lead_paragraph: He appeared to contradict reports that the Romney campaign, when considering Chris Christie for the vice presidency, was concerned about his health.

headline.main: Romney Sees Christie as Potential G.O.P. Savior in ’16
headline.print_headline: Romney Sees Christie as Potential G.O.P. Savior in ’16
